title: LC-MS Metabolomics Analysis
description: Comprehensive LC-MS metabolomics data processing from raw mass spectrometry to metabolite identification. Performs feature detection, alignment, adduct detection, and MS2-based compound identification. Samplesheet format: `sample,mzml_file`
content:
MetaboIgniter - LC-MS Metabolomics Analysis

Comprehensive bioinformatics pipeline for processing and analyzing liquid chromatography-mass spectrometry (LC-MS) metabolomics data. Processes raw mass spectrometry data in mzML format through advanced feature detection, alignment, and metabolite identification workflows.

What is MetaboIgniter?

MetaboIgniter automates the complex process of converting raw LC-MS data into identified metabolites, enabling researchers to perform comprehensive metabolite profiling across multiple samples with standardized workflows.

Key Features

  • End-to-End Processing: From raw mzML to metabolite identifications
  • MS1/MS2 Support: Process both MS1 and MS2 spectra
  • Advanced Detection: Sophisticated feature and adduct detection
  • Multi-Sample Alignment: Align features across samples
  • Compound Identification: MS2Query and SIRIUS integration
  • Missing Value Handling: Requantification to fill gaps

Pipeline Workflow

  1. Centroiding: Convert continuous mass spectra to discrete points
  2. Feature Detection: Identify unique signals in MS1 spectra
  3. Adduct Detection: Recognize ion interactions and adduct formations
  4. Sample Alignment: Match features across different samples
  5. Linking: Connect features across ionization modes (positive/negative)
  6. Requantification: Fill missing data values across samples
  7. Identification: Use MS2Query and SIRIUS for compound identification
  8. Quality Control: Generate comprehensive QC reports

Scientific Applications

  • Metabolomics Research: Comprehensive metabolite profiling
  • Biomarker Discovery: Identify disease or treatment markers
  • Systems Biology: Integrate with other omics data
  • Drug Metabolism: Study drug metabolites and pathways
  • Environmental Science: Analyze environmental metabolites

Advantages

  • Automated Workflow: Reduces manual processing time
  • Reproducible Results: Standardized analysis pipeline
  • Advanced Algorithms: State-of-the-art metabolite detection
  • Comprehensive Coverage: MS1 and MS2 analysis integrated
  • Community Developed: Best practices from metabolomics experts

Input Requirements

  • mzML Files: Converted raw mass spectrometry data
  • Sample Sheet: CSV with sample information and file paths
  • Optional: Metadata for experimental design
  • Reference Databases: For compound identification

Main Outputs

  • Feature Tables: Quantified metabolite features across samples
  • Identification Results: Putative compound identifications
  • MS2 Matches: Spectral library matching results
  • SIRIUS Annotations: Structural predictions and formula assignments
  • QC Reports: MultiQC summary of quality metrics
  • Aligned Peaks: Cross-sample aligned feature lists

Perfect for: Metabolomics • Mass Spectrometry • Biomarker Discovery • Drug Metabolism • Systems Biology
